name: Initial A: The Vision of Saint John of Christ Enthroned and David Playing the Harp
description: Initial A: The Vision of Saint John of Christ Enthroned and David Playing the Harp; Unknown; Lyon, France; begun after 1234 - completed before 1262; Tempera colors and gold leaf on parchment; Leaf: 24.8 x 16.7 cm (9 3/4 x 6 9/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig V 5, fol. 7; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Initial A: The Vision of Saint John of Christ Enthroned and David Playing the Harp
medium: Tempera colors and gold leaf on parchment
